replies.txt_content:
å¼•ç”¨å†…å®¹-----[As it remains uncertain when Chocohead will return to update Advanced Solar Panels, I have made a patch to fix the crash that is happening with newer versions of IC2.

1. Download the patched classes from here.

2. Open Advanced+Solar+Panels-4.3.0.jar with 7-Zip and navigate to the following directory: com > chocohead > advsolar.

3. Open advsolar_patched_classes.zip with 7-Zip and drag the two folders (tiles and slots) to the Advanced Solar Panels 7-Zip window. Accept the confirmation dialogue that pops up in the Advanced Solar Panels 7-Zip window. Advanced Solar Panels should now work with the newer versions of IC2.



As you should be wary of downloading binary files from untrusted sources, I encourage you to decompile the class files and examine their contents yourself.]-----
